tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Saint Mark the Evangelist [Svaty Marek Evangelista], plate VII, "Ethiopie, cili Christos, Madonna a Svati, jak jsem ie videl v illuminacich starych ethiopskych kodexu" Portfolio, 1920", 1920.
1920. Hand-colored linoleum cut print with red pen additions on paper. Gift of Elaine Lustig Cohen. 2000-20-9-9.
